price: Na Mungu wenu ni Mungu mmoja tu, hapana mungu ila Yeye. Mwingi wa rehema, Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: وَإِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
footnotes: Hakika Mungu wenu anaye stahiki kuabudiwa pekee ni Mmoja. Hakuna mungu mwenginewe, wala hapana utawala ila wake. Tena Yeye amesifika kuwa ni Mwenye rehema, basi Yeye ni Rahim, Mwenye Kuwarehemu waja wake katika kuwaumba na kuwafanya walivyo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun lā ilāha illā huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
